### Musical Mapping

| Emotion    | Musical Element      | Example              |
|------------|----------------------|----------------------|
| Grief      | Minor key            | Slow tempo, cello   |
| Joy        | Major key            | Upbeat rhythm, brass|
| Anger      | Dissonant chords     | Percussive elements |
| Peace      | Sustained notes      | Flute melodies      |
